said the unit had promptly repaired an
electric fence post that had been knocked down by wild elephants
in Ta Lai commune, Tan
Phu district.  The wild elephant tag has reached
the stage where the electronic fence has not yet been built so that it can go
outside the people's fields in search of
food. This elephant tag is very aggressive and
chases the people, then the wild elephant
knocked down an electronic fence post.  Then
back to In the Forest. Since 2017,
Dong Nai Forest Protection Department has deployed the
construction of an electric fence more than 50
km long along the forest edge from Phu Ly commune
and Phu Ly commune, Vinh C district to Thanh Son commune
and Tai commune, Vinh C district.  However,
in recent times, wild elephants have
continued to go out to residential areas to look for
food, destroy crops and threaten
people. The reason is that the
electronic fence has not been completed to close
the forest, so  Elephants often try to go through the
empty point of the electronic fence to enter
the residential area. In the afternoon, through the traffic police department,

Hoang went to receive drugs for slaves four times

applying the floating farm model on

In the Netherlands, a floating dairy farm
has been operating since 2019 and is said to
be the first model of this type in the world.
This place is called Floating Farm located
in the city of Rotc Dam. The farm carries out
closed production using
waste and recycling cows that graze on
dry grass and orange peels taken from the juicer
in the supermarket.  drinking rainwater
collected from the farm's canopy section
where robots are used to milk and
collect waste which is then processed into
organic fertilizer Floating Farm sells
dairy products and cheese at a store
small located nearby countries around the
world are looking for
self-sufficient solutions in one way or another
because climate change is a
big problem when you have a floating farm you are
adapting to the conditions  weather conditions
and can produce fresh products
for the city. Ms. Mink van Wien, the
farm owner, said this place attracts quite a
few visitors, which shows that
many people are very interested in
agricultural projects.  This floating dairy farm creation
was built after
Mrs. van Wingen's husband witnessed the
food shortage in New York, USA after
Sandy swept through this city in

no casualties were reported
